data.enText: very tired, both physically and mentally

ex.enText: I am always tired when I come home from work.
ex.chText: 我下班回家时总是很疲倦。

ex.enText: She was so tired that she fell asleep quickly.
ex.chText: 她非常疲劳，很快就睡着了。

synonyms.bx: 普通用词，泛指因工作紧张、劳累过度、休息不足等而感到疲惫的、困倦的。

ex.chText: 最后，人困马乏的部队投降了。
他看上去一幅疲惫不堪的样子。

ex.enText: He was fatigued from staying up all night.
The builders were too fatigued to push on.
ex.chText: 建筑工人们十分劳累，再也干不下去了。

ex.enText: The doctor said that the boy was fatigued but otherwise in good physical condition.
ex.chText: 医生说小男孩虽然疲惫不堪，但身体状况良好。

synonyms.bx: 指极度劳累的，与 exhausted 同义，但通常用于正式文体。

ex.enText: We all felt weary after such a long journey.
ex.chText: 经过这么长时间的旅行后，我们都觉得很累。

ex.enText: He was never weary of experimenting with different ways of planting his crops.
ex.chText: 他一向不厌其烦地尝试播种农作物的各种方法。

ex.enText: People were growing weary of the war.
ex.chText: 人们对这场战争越来越厌倦了。

ex.enText: He stood up with a weary sigh.
ex.chText: 他疲倦地叹口气站了起来。

synonyms.bx: 尤指因长期做某事或从事某项活动而非常疲劳的，含有感到厌烦之意。

ex.enText: I'm worn out by this hard work.
ex.chText: 这份艰苦的工作使我疲惫不堪。

ex.enText: She was really worn out after two sleepless nights.
ex.chText: 经过两个不眠之夜，她真的累坏了。

synonyms.bx: 指因辛勤工作而精疲力竭的，通常作表语。

example: the day's shopping left her exhausted
the trembling of his played out limbs

example.ex: Winter weather can leave you feeling fatigued and tired.
example.tran: 冬季会让人感觉疲乏无力。

value.def: If you are feeling fatigued, you are suffering from extreme physical or mental tiredness.
value.tran: 疲惫的;疲劳的;精疲力竭的
